card1.content: View the Food Loss and Waste reduction activities collected by the project by clicking on one of the categories below. Click on the logo for more information. Use the Home button below to return to the Data Space. This application demonstrates how information can be found and shared in an easy and controlled way by making use of standardized protocols for a data space.

card2.content: This project is co-funded by Horizon Europe programme that aims to improve the understanding between social norms, consumer behaviours and economic actor decisions and waste generation. The project's main goal is to address existing research gaps and will use its outcomes to deliver and advance innovations helping actors to engage more effectively in waste prevention and reduction activities.
